text: Established in 1865, Shaw University was the first HBCU in the South to be established after the American Civil War.

text: The name of the first medical school for African Americans is called Meharry Medical College .

text: University of the Virgin Islands is the only HBCU outside of the continental US.

text: Lincoln University is the United States' first degree-granting historically African American university.
The first HBCU owned and operated by African Americans was Wilberforce University in Ohio which was founded in 1856.
